code: import React from"react";import Title from"./Title";import{tourData}from"../data";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Tours(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"section  mb-large",id:"tours",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Title,{main_title:"Featured",sub_title:"tours"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"featured-center",children:tourData.map(tour=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"tour-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tour-img-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:tour.image,alt:tour.alt}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"tour-date",children:[tour.date,"/"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tour-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{className:"mb-1",children:tour.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mb-1",children:tour.info}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tour-footer",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"tour-footer-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-solid fa-map"}),tour.location]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:tour.duration}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:tour.cost})]})})]})]},tour.id);})})]});}export default Tours;
